name: 2024 7th International Conference on Intelligent Robotics and Control Engineering
content: Publication: Accepted and presented papers will be published in 【IRCE 2024 Conference Proceedings】. The proceedings will be published by 【IEEE and archived in IEEE Xplore】, and will be indexed by 【Ei Compendex and Scopus】, etc. IRCE 2024 is included in IEEE event list! More information can be found via: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/62232
organizers: Xi’an University of Technology, China, IEEE
